text: Von Ryan's Express is a 1965 American World War II adventure movie directed by Mark Robson and based on the novel of the same name by David Westheimer. It stars Frank Sinatra, Trevor Howard, Raffaella Carr√†, Brad Dexter, Sergio Fantoni, John Leyton, James Brolin, Edward Mulhare, Wolfgang Preiss, Vito Scotti and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1966. ==Other websites== * * Category:1965 war movies Category:1965 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Belgian movies Category:Belgian adventure movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Robson Category:Movies based on books
title: Von Ryan's Express
